title: Patching issue on NA 10/08/2016
body:
Hey all,

We've noticed players reporting that they are getting a message that reads, **"An Unspecified Error has Occurred."** when downloading a patch today. We are currently investigating the issue and looking to resolve it. In the meantime, Pressing the **"Retry"** button seems to be allowing players to patch properly. I'll try to update this thread when there's more information available.

**UPDATE**: Some players are reporting updating their Antivirus programs are allowing them to patch normally. 

**UPDATE#2**: The [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) has been updated to reflect the issues on NA. Please check this page for the most up to date information.

**UPDATE#3**: Issue is resolved!

replies.body: it does work in EU West

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yc623nzp,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-08T18:58:58.094+0000)
>
> Hey all,
> 
> We&#039;ve noticed players reporting that they are getting a message that reads, **&quot;An Unspecified Error has Occurred.&quot;** when downloading a patch today. We are currently investigating the issue and looking to resolve it. In the meantime, Pressing the **&quot;Retry&quot;** button seems to be allowing players to patch properly. I&#039;ll try to update this thread when there&#039;s more information available.
> 
> **UPDATE**: Some players are reporting updating their Antivirus programs are allowing them to patch normally. 
> 
> **UPDATE#2**: The [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) has been updated to reflect the issues on NA. Please check this page for the most up to date information.
> 
> **UPDATE#3**: Issue is resolved!

Can confirm issue is resolved. Re-install / retry did not do anything for me (W7, was working fine yesterday), but my last attempt finally worked!

I've retried three times now and nothing has changed except for one thing. The client now says 0 files scanned instead of 1. I've repaired, checked for connection issues, and reinstalled. However, if I change region, everything works just fine. It would lead me to believe the problem is not client side, since this is the case.

Mine says 1 file scanned, 33%, then unspecified error. And clicking Retry, it goes to 0 files scanned, 33%, and does nothing o.O

EDIT: Actually it just patched after retry and waiting a few minutes.
The Retry button doesn't do anything. It just changes it to 0 Files scanned instead of 1.

> [{quoted}](name=The Transcendent,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yc623nzp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-10-08T19:21:15.802+0000)
>
> The Retry button doesn't do anything. It just changes it to 0 Files scanned instead of 1.

JUST KIDDING IT UPDATED WITH RETRY <3 TY
Didn't for me, and loading into EU West lets me update properly. Just NA isn't working. I tried repairing and did two fresh re-installs, nothing worked.

> [{quoted}](name=Troy242621,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yc623nzp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-08T19:01:07.285+0000)
>
> Didn't for me, and loading into EU West lets me update properly. Just NA isn't working. I tried repairing and did two fresh re-installs, nothing worked.

Thanks for the info. I've updated the post to better reflect that.
Have you guys tried not patching the game every 2 hours?
